publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3073# Elaine Thomson: Transport Strategy for Aberdeen and North East Scotland-That the Parliament commends the North East of Scotland Transport Partnership for developing and progressing a regional transport strategy for Aberdeen and the north east of Scotland that promotes modal shift and tackles growing congestion, including the effective development of park-and-ride schemes in Bridge of Don and Kingswells.

S1M-3073# Elaine Thomson: Transport Strategy for Aberdeen and North East Scotland-That the Parliament commends the North East of Scotland Transport Partnership *(NESTRANS)* for developing and progressing a regional transport strategy for Aberdeen and the north east of Scotland that promotes modal shift and tackles growing congestion, including the effective development of park-and-ride schemes in Bridge of Don and Kingswells. Supported by: Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Trish Godman*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*

S1M-3073# Transport Strategy for Aberdeen and North East Scotland (lodged on 7 May 2002) Brian Fitzpatrick*, Mr John McAllion*, Nora Radcliffe*, Karen Gillon*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Scott Barrie*, Helen Eadie*

S1M-3073# Elaine Thomson: Transport Strategy for Aberdeen and North East Scotland-That the Parliament commends the North East of Scotland Transport Partnership (NESTRANS) for developing and progressing a regional transport strategy for Aberdeen and the north east of Scotland that promotes modal shift and tackles growing congestion, including the effective development of park-and-ride schemes in Bridge of Don and Kingswells. Supported by: Dr Sylvia Jackson, Trish Godman, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Brian Fitzpatrick, Mr John McAllion, Nora Radcliffe, Karen Gillon, Mr Jamie Stone, Scott Barrie, Helen Eadie
S1M-3073# Transport Strategy for Aberdeen and North East Scotland (lodged on 7 May 2002) Sarah Boyack*, Karen Whitefield*
S1M-3073# Transport Strategy for Aberdeen and North East Scotland (lodged on 7 May 2002) Ms Wendy Alexander*
S1M-3073# Transport Strategy for Aberdeen and North East Scotland (lodged on 7 May 2002) Alex Johnstone*

S1M-3073# Elaine Thomson: Transport Strategy for Aberdeen and North East Scotlandâ€”That the Parliament commends the North East of Scotland Transport Partnership (NESTRANS) for developing and progressing a regional transport strategy for Aberdeen and the north east of Scotland that promotes modal shift and tackles growing congestion, including the effective development of park-and-ride schemes in Bridge of Don and Kingswells. Supported by: Dr Sylvia Jackson, Trish Godman, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Brian Fitzpatrick, Mr John McAllion, Nora Radcliffe, Karen Gillon, Mr Jamie Stone, Scott Barrie, Helen Eadie, Sarah Boyack, Karen Whitefield, Ms Wendy Alexander, Alex Johnstone
